archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Domain Ledger
archimate:Principle.documentation: The subledger of the Sovrin Ledger used to record Identity-related Transaction Types except Payments (which use the Sovrin Payment Ledger). The Sovrin Domain Ledger is publicly readable. It is publicly writable via protection mechanisms specified in the Sovrin Governance Framework.
